itemDescription: Olympic lacrosse player of Great Britain

wikipedia_page.main: Eric Ogden Dutton (26 July 1883 – 29 March 1968) was a British lacrosse player who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics. He was part of the British team that won the silver medal.
